newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: Sam Yang buys 15,000T of U.S. soybean.
newsitem.headline: Sam Yang buys 15,000T of U.S. soybean.

text.p: South Korea's Sam Yang Foods Co Ltd said on Wednesday it bought 15,000 tonnes of U.S. No.2 soybean at basis over March futures on the Chicago Board of Trade.
A Sam Yang official said the company bought the soybean from Japanese trading house Marubeni Corp through closed negotiation.
Shipment was slated for the first half of February from the U.S. Gulf to South Korea's western port of Inchon.
The official did not give further details, such as price and exact arrival date. -- Seoul Newsroom (822) 727 5651
